artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; scene on the deck of a ship; standing figure on right, with PR leg raised and sword in PR hand; figure on left, falling off the edge of the ship into the water; slain figures in sailor uniforms on right, lying unconscious on deck of ship; exploding ship in the water in left image; black sky; plumes of white smoke rising behind the deck of the ship
inscription: on right sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: RD 02 010 50 QTB
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Records of the Hostilities between Japan and Russia (Nichiro kōsen kibun 日露交戰紀聞)
title: On the 10th of March Amid Close Battle Between Our and Enemy Destroyers, a First Class Seaman of Our Sazanami Leapt Aboard an Enemy Ship, and Bearing Down on the Ship’s Captain, Gave a Thunderous Shout, and Brandishing his Sword, Cut Him Down and Kicked Him from the Deck into the Sea
